message.body: So I haven't seem Her do as single dish... But she sure as hell could find the time get her nails and hair done. Not on his dine to her credit.
But I just want her to leave. She's needy she holds on to him in bed. I'm afraid she's making him have sex with her. He's so tired... She got up to pee and he fell asleep...

And I'm walking around doing laundry, dishwashing, taking care of the garden, Cooking, returning broken things, running to cvs And the supermarket ... And she's cuddling. I'm not complaining, except I am... Bc I don't want to clean up after her breakfast. W
My grandpa woke up With a fever this morning and I think it's bc we went out to dinner last night. I should have insisted we stay in except she really wanted to go be around people bc it is lively.
And then she's calling all His old friends who are deaf mds and making my grandpa scream on the phone with them while I'm in the other room talking to his doctors...
Who can hear just fine
Sorry I'm venting
Ok I'm just pissed bc she keeps asking him questions instead of finding the answers herself. She can take herself for a swim, and track water everywhere and I have to clean it up...
It's like she could unload the dishwasher or even make herself a coffee
Oh and also, she made a joke about my grandpa raping me.
Wtf
dude she's old. And Maybe jealous of you?
I dunno but bottom line, if you think it's her job to take her of him, I dunno. Different people have different ideas of the role a gf or bf play in a relationship
She sounds shitty but some people have shitty gfs? You shouldn't clean up after her tho that's def bs
well , its his place to decide if she's making it harder or not
That sucks for you tho
But I guess the way I feel is, Doing stuff for your grandfather means doing stuff for his life and how he wants to live it
It's not her job... But it's not her job to make things harder for him
I'm just venting
She's leaving in a few hours b
She is jealous
An that includes his shitty gf apparently
Yeah u right!
*and
That suuuucks for you tho I'm sorry
She keeps asking me about how I sell my work
She really wants to sell
Haha you hate her so much lol
Will you survive the next few days?!
I know
Hahahhaa
I love u!!!
U have now seen me at my most evil
Hahaha I mean, you are getting free stuff. It sucks that you have to deal w his annoying selfish gf but like You get free stuff. That's so cool!!! Jealous!
and it sucks that she's trying to sneak your grandmas stuff away
But shitty gfs will Be shitty gfs. Including trying to get ex wives stuffS. Sounds pretty par for the course- tho tacky
What are you guys going to do today??
Its not the stuff... I guess that's hard to understand. It's not the stuff at all.. Most of it is serious trash ruined from mildew etc.
But it's just the way she needs affection from him Instead of giving him
Giving/listening to him
She isn't protecting him... She is just worried
That's ok I really do think she's great
I am grateful I just realized she sits there and watches him while he sleeps... She could help out a bit.
Haha yeah so you think he has a shitty selfish gf
But whatever
Yeah exactly. Lots of people LIke shitty selfish people
It's fine I think my grandma was supposedly like that too
We are doing absolutely nothing!!!
What are you doing
They think it's cute. You and I have dated shitty selfish people
(Grandpa has to sleep sleep sleep)
Yes
It is cute... Your right
Bc they need you
It's a good reminder Not to
Yes exactly
You see I feel confident that James can and would take care of you...
Mental note to self: do not date shitty people no matter how cute they are, or your grand kids will get frustrated
Not that u need it
Hahahhaa ha
You are so funny!!!!
Since when?
My friends/only friend is beautiful, smart, neurotic, and funny!!!!
Whoa is me!
Life is so good!!!
Oh!! I can't believe you're painting in southern California!!! You are living the dream!!

Also-don't judge me but the piazza pool Membership is less than 200 for the summer and you get free guest each visit and I'm buying it with my friend Jennifer Visit Me! We can lounge at the pool daily
Ok I'm down
￼This is one of those moments where you might wish I had a boyfriend so you could be spared. But this is amazing!!!! Lobster nude!!
LOL this is amazing!!!!
Oh no!! Put the aloe on that !!!
Haha I can't believe you sent that
You're lucky we don't get into epic fights- the kind that would warrant usage of that as blackmail lol
HAha
Oh man this guarantees our friendship
￼So fucking cute
￼I can cook
!!!!!! Is that sausage?!!! Omg. Also, I KNOW you can. I think you're a great cook actually. I bought a slow cooker and I've been cooking a lot too!
Oh my god. A slow cooker. That's so domestic of you !!!
Hahaha I knoooow - I made a beef stew one day, a rice/mushroom/peanut Thai sauce thingy, and chicken soup, and a broccoli cheese soup that was soooo good
Me at the piazza pool lololol
O￼
Any cute boys
￼And Jennifer!! Weeee
She's 35! So inspiring. Hope I look that good in 8 yrs
*fingers crossed
Sexy ladies!!!!
Oh my god! I'm jealous!
Did you show her how much better she looks than the 27 yr old lobster nude!
